login.title: Login
login.desc: Not a member yet? Take our personality test or enter your results to create your free profile.
login.emailLabel: Learn more about your personality type

hero.title: “I finally feel understood about myself”
hero.description: In just 10 minutes, you can gain an amazingly accurate explanation about what kind of person you are, and the reasons behind your attitudes and behaviors.
hero.resultDesc: Results rated as accurate or very accurate

understandOthers.label: Personality Types
understandOthers.title: Understand Others
understandOthers.description: Our free type descriptions help you learn what drives, stimulates, and concerns different personality types, and support you in building more meaningful relationships.

team.label: Team
team.title: Understand Others
team.description: Deepen your team understanding with our team assessments. Improve communication, create harmony, and help team members grow their individual strengths. Works for teams of any size.

list.name: Benny
list.feedback: Incredibly thorough and even a little frightening. It feels like someone is holding a mirror up to my mind, showing me my true self whether I like it or not.

list.name: Nicole
list.feedback: Wow! This site is amazing! I took the test and the results were so accurate—it felt like my true self was finally validated. It was as if someone finally understood me, and I realized I’m not a weirdo after all.

list.name: Caroline
list.feedback: Reading this profile makes me feel comforted, excited, inspired, and a little amazed! Having my strengths and weaknesses described so clearly is truly wonderful.

list.name: Marta
list.feedback: I’m so glad to read an article that describes me so well… and even more relieved to know I’m not strange! I never thought a profile could be this accurate.

list.name: Melody
list.feedback: Everything finally clicked into place. It’s like I was freed from inner chains and could breathe again. I rediscovered a part of myself, a passion I had forgotten years ago.
